author: CBC News
title: Fighting rages near Kyiv as Russia keeps up siege of other cities | CBC News
description: Fighting raged northwest of Kyiv on Saturday, with the bulk of Russian ground forces 25 kilometres from the centre of the Ukrainian capital, while several other cities were encircled and under heavy shelling, the U.K. Defence Ministry said.
